text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Flying. Spawns uncommonly. Drops Windy Plant Food

$(br2)$(#bd951a)Loquat dreams of becoming a ballet dancer, and she has one trick: she can do many turns in place. "I believe I can be the world's greatest ballet dancer, but no one wants to hire me, I don't understand why."

pages.title: â›¨ Reinforce Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Their Windy Plant Food makes plants that interact with flying Zombies.
